constituent: long time, bound up, person, mummy
heisigStory: This character uses the diagonal sweep of the second stroke to double up for bound up and a person. Think of a mummy, and the key word will not be far behind.
koohiiStory1: Note: this is the ひさ in ひさしぶり . Long time no see mummy! (A bound up person).
koohiiStory2: This is a picture of a person bowing "long time no see!".
readingExamples: 永久 (えいきゅう), 持久 (じきゅう), 耐久 (たいきゅう), 久しい (ひさ.しい)
words: after a long time, long time (no see)
